definition: to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: My debts were like a millstone round my neck.
sentences.chinese: 我欠的債象是在脖子上套着個磨盤。

sentences.english: Today, millstones of the same shape are still being used.
sentences.chinese: 至今同一形制的磨盤還在使用。

sentences.english: The most ancient millstone was unearthed just nearby.
sentences.chinese: 附近曾經出土過最古老的石磨盤。

sentences.english: The millstone installed on the ground. People should stoop to push it slowly.
sentences.chinese: 磨盤安在地上，人推石磨時得弓腰緩行。

sentences.english: The mills of God grind slowly, but finely ground.
sentences.chinese: 上帝的磨盤轉動很慢，但是卻磨得很細。

sentences.english: My debts were like a millstone round my neck .
sentences.chinese: 我欠的債像是在脖子上套着個磨盤。

sentences.english: Mopan persimmon was confirmed as respiration climacteric fruit.
sentences.chinese: 確定磨盤柿爲呼吸躍變型果實。

sentences.english: The nitrogen and phosphorus are main non-point sources pollutants in the water of Mopanshan reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 氮和磷是磨盤山水庫水體非點源污染最主要的污染物。

sentences.english: The three abrasive rollers are distributed at the roller path of the millstone uniformly, and are fixedly to the loading rack.
sentences.chinese: 三個磨輥均分佈於磨盤輥道上，並鉸固在加載架上。

sentences.english: Water in Mopanshan reservoir is in good condition.
sentences.chinese: 磨盤山水庫整體水質情況良好。

definition: (bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
to cross (a road, an ocean etc)/to cut across
